# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates an HTTP cookie property key using the given string.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ rawValue: String)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: The string to use as a key.

## Discussion

You can use this initializer to create HTTP cookie property keys that aren’t already represented by the predefined constants.

This convenience initializer is identical to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookiePropertyKey/init(rawValue:)].

## Creating custom cookie property keys

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an HTTP cookie property key using the given string.
